messages.description: This is a multilingual website built with Nuxt.js and i18n

hero.title: Building Blockchain Solutions for the Future
hero.description: We provide enterprise-grade blockchain technology services to empower your digital transformation journey. From consulting and planning to technical implementation, we create secure, efficient, and scalable blockchain applications for you.

polygonPos.title: Polygon PoS
polygonPos.description: Supports the most widely used Ethereum scaling ecosystem, offering EVM compatibility and ultimate user experience with fast transactions and near-zero gas fees.

polygonZkEvm.title: Polygon zkEVM
polygonZkEvm.description: Unlocks Ethereum scalability while maintaining security. The first ZK-rollup providing EVM equivalence for fast transactions and near-zero gas costs.

miden.title: Miden
miden.description: A decentralized rollup leveraging private data storage and local transaction execution. Scaling better with privacy.

agglayerCdk.title: Agglayer CDK
agglayerCdk.description: Build Ethereum Layer 2 solutions using industry-leading ZK technology and ecosystems.

hero.title: About Us
hero.subtitle: Global Intelligent Technology Solutions Provider
hero.description: ZHILING ARK TECHNOLOGY PTE. LTD. is a Singapore-based global intelligent technology solutions provider dedicated to delivering next-generation digital transformation and intelligent automation solutions through advanced cloud computing and AI integration. We build enterprise-grade AI aggregation platforms and smart middleware solutions that unify disparate systems, simplify cross-platform data collaboration, and enable large-scale intelligent automated operations.

address.title: Company Address
address.regional: Asia-Pacific Regional Offices: Branches in multiple cities

form.title: Send Message
form.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, please feel free to contact us. We will respond as soon as possible.
form.name: Name
form.subject: Subject

aws.name: AWS
aws.description: Global leading cloud platform. We build enterprise-grade AI aggregation platforms on AWS to deliver scalable intelligent solutions.

azure.name: Microsoft Azure
azure.description: Microsoft's cloud platform. We leverage Azure's AI services and cloud infrastructure to provide smart middleware and automation solutions.

googleCloud.name: Google Cloud
googleCloud.description: Google Cloud Platform. We integrate its advanced AI and machine learning services to help businesses achieve intelligent operations and data insights.

oracle.name: Oracle
oracle.description: Enterprise database and cloud services provider. We collaborate with Oracle to deliver reliable data management and intelligent analytics solutions.

singapore.name: Singapore Government Agencies
singapore.description: Singapore government technology departments. We provide smart technology solutions for government digital transformation projects to enhance public service efficiency.

multinational.name: Multinational Corporations
multinational.description: We partner with multinational enterprises to enable global digital transformation and intelligent operations through our AI aggregation platforms and smart middleware.

education.name: Educational Institutions
education.description: Leading universities and research institutions. We collaborate on blockchain technology research, talent development, and innovation.

retail.name: Retail Groups
retail.description: Major retail enterprises. We co-developed blockchain loyalty programs and anti-counterfeiting traceability systems to enhance customer experience and brand value.

cta.title: Become Our Partner
cta.description: We welcome enterprises and organizations from all industries to collaborate with us in exploring smart technology applications for digital transformation. Whether you need AI aggregation solutions or seek strategic partnerships, we look forward to connecting with you.

zhangwei.name: Zhang Wei
zhangwei.description: 10+ years in smart technology industry. Former tech leadership roles at renowned companies. Focuses on commercial applications of AI aggregation platforms and intelligent ecosystem development.

liming.name: Li Ming
liming.description: 15+ years in cloud and AI R&D. Former technical lead at top tech firms. Specializes in enterprise AI platform architecture and smart middleware solutions.

wangfang.name: Wang Fang
wangfang.description: Senior product manager with deep understanding of enterprise digitalization needs. Excels at transforming complex tech concepts into user-friendly intelligent solutions.

zhaoqiang.name: Zhao Qiang
zhaoqiang.description: Full-stack expert proficient in cloud-native architecture and AI middleware. Contributed to core development of multiple enterprise intelligent platforms.

chenjing.name: Chen Jing
chenjing.description: Specializes in enterprise intelligent solution design. Expert in analyzing business requirements and delivering optimal cloud-AI integration strategies.

liuyang.name: Liu Yang
liuyang.description: Cloud security and data governance expert. Focuses on enterprise security architecture design and compliance. Veteran of multiple digital transformation security assessments.

join.title: Join Our Team
join.description: We're always seeking exceptional talent. If you're passionate about blockchain and want to develop cutting-edge technologies, join us!
